accountModules.name: govstat_target_tolerance
accountModules.description: Enable goal tolerance logic in GovStat.

accountModules.name: sdp_customizer
accountModules.description: Access is granted to the SDP customizer

accountModules.name: basic_visualization
accountModules.description: Bar, Pie, Line Charts, Heat Maps, Point Maps

accountModules.name: advanced_visualization
accountModules.description: Combo Charts, Bubble Charts, County-level Heatmaps

accountModules.name: basic_metrics
accountModules.description: Aggregate usage counts, web propagation summary, day-old metrics

accountModules.name: advanced_metrics
accountModules.description: Detailed usage counts, web prop details, > 30 days, real-time

accountModules.name: dataset_nomination
accountModules.description: Visitors can nominate datasets for inclusion

accountModules.name: dataset_approval
accountModules.description: Publishers can set up a signoff process for datasets

accountModules.name: community_creation
accountModules.description: Allow community members to create datasets

accountModules.name: openid_login
accountModules.description: Allow users to log in via OpenID

accountModules.name: allow_comments
accountModules.description: Allow users to comment on datasets

accountModules.name: digital_signatures
accountModules.description: Create digital signatures for datasets to prove integrity

accountModules.name: use_soda2
accountModules.description: Force the domain to use SODA2 API
